name: commander-v
description: Instantly orients an AI (or human) in the structure and layout of your code by concatenating selected files, together with an optional ASCII view of your project's directory structure.

commanderV.includeProjectTree.description: Include an ASCII tree representing your project's directory structure in the payload sent to your clipboard

commanderV.projectTreeDepth.description: The maximum depth of directories to include in the generated ASCII tree. Not applied when "Prune Project Tree" is enabled.

commanderV.pruneProjectTree.description: Limit the tree to only include files that have been selected

enumDescriptions: Order by position in the tree...
commanderV.orderFilesBy.description: Specify how to sort files when concatenating their content

commanderV.ignoreFile.title: Ignore File
commanderV.ignoreFile.description: Path to your ignore file, containing patterns to exclude from the generated ASCII tree. Not applied when "Prune Project Tree" is enabled.

commanderV.commentAtFileBegin.description: Opening comment shown at the beginning of every file. Use $file as a placeholder for the file path

commanderV.commentAtFileEnd.description: Closing comment shown at the end of every file. Use $file as a placeholder for the file path

commanderV.playSoundOnComplete.description: Play a sound when operations are successful and output is delivered to you clipboard
